com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory
Class DBConnectionFactoryHelper

java.lang.Object
  com.topcoder.db.connectionfactory.DBConnectionFactoryHelper
public final class DBConnectionFactoryHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This is the helper class added in version 1.1. It contains useful methods for checking arguments and for reducing code redundancy.

Version:
1.1
Author:
magicpig

getChildFromConfigurationObject

public static com.topcoder.configuration.ConfigurationObject getChildFromConfigurationObject(java.lang.String name,
                                                                                             com.topcoder.configuration.ConfigurationObject configurationObject,
                                                                                             java.lang.String key)
                                                                                      throws com.topcoder.configuration.ConfigurationAccessException

Gets the child ConfigurationObject for key from given configurationObject.

Parameters:
name - the name of the configurationObject
configurationObject - the ConfigurationObject to get child ConfigurationObject from
key - the name of the child ConfigurationObject to get
Returns:
the retrieved child ConfigurationObject
Throws:
com.topcoder.configuration.ConfigurationAccessException - if any error occurs while retrieving the child from configurationObject
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the configurationObject is null or the ConfigurationObject instance for key is null; if the key is null or empty

getNullOrStringValueFromConfigurationObject

public static java.lang.String getNullOrStringValueFromConfigurationObject(com.topcoder.configuration.ConfigurationObject configurationObject,
                                                                           java.lang.String key)
                                                                    throws com.topcoder.configuration.ConfigurationAccessException

This method gets null or String value from the given ConfigurationObject.

Parameters:
configurationObject - the ConfigurationObject instance to get value from
key - the name of the property whose value to get
Returns:
the retrieved value
Throws:
com.topcoder.configuration.ConfigurationAccessException - if any error occurs while retrieving the value from configurationObject
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the retrieved value is non-null non-String object;if the key is null or empty
